author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Update the blame API to use svn_client_blame3().  This does not expose
all the functionality offered by blame3(), but it does improve things.
(blame): Add an ignoreMimeTypes parameter, and update the client call to use
svn_client_blame3().  Use default diff_file_options for now.
parameter, and use it in the call to SVNClient::blame().
(blame):  Add a new implementation which takes a ignoreMimeType parameter.
Reimplement old APIs in terms of the new one.
